--- title: "Probability Theory" --- # Assignment 1 ------------------------------------------------------------------------ **T** - *Being on time* **T_not** - *Not being on time* **S** - *Change in Scope* **S_not** - *No change in scope* > Defining the probabilities from the probability tree ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_6a2d47ca56380739f5221c5280c01d62'} ```{.r .cell-code} P_S <- 0.3 P_S_not <- 0.7 P_T_given_S <- 0.2 P_T_given_S_not <- 0.6 ``` ::: **P(T ∩ S)** - *P_T_and_S* **(T ∩ ¬S)** - *P_T_and_S_not* **P(¬T ∩ S)** - *P_not_T_and_S* **P(¬T ∩ ¬S)** - *P_not_T_and_S_not* ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_2d5e0ae067ed24004e9568727109cd51'} ```{.r .cell-code} # Compute the joint probabilities P_T_and_S <- P_S * P_T_given_S P_T_and_S_not <- P_S_not * P_T_given_S_not P_not_T_and_S <- P_S * (1 - P_T_given_S) P_not_T_and_S_not <- P_S_not * (1 - P_T_given_S_not) ``` ::: ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_a7378d334235344eb70b382153ef5fc0'} ```{.r .cell-code} P_T_and_S ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] 0.06 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} P_T_and_S_not ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] 0.42 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} P_not_T_and_S ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] 0.24 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} P_not_T_and_S_not ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] 0.28 ``` ::: ::: > Sum of all probabilities ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_8a1882c90e92790c3b150a05ea65379e'} ```{.r .cell-code} probabilities_sum <- P_T_and_S + P_T_and_S_not + P_not_T_and_S + P_not_T_and_S_not ``` ::: ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_e807b3b20ed930c0eb8931bc9f3cefce'} ```{.r .cell-code} probabilities_sum ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] 1 ``` ::: ::: # Assignment 2 ------------------------------------------------------------------------ > Information from the Venn Diagram ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_835efc2d12ac01ff9da7ec0ccb98e992'} ```{.r .cell-code} percentage_all_three_devices <- 0.5 percentage_smartphone_tablet <- 7.3 percentage_tablet_computer <- 3.3 percentage_smartphone_computer <- 8.8 percentage_smartphone = 42.3 percentage_tablet = 27.8 percentage_computer = 10 ``` ::: ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-7_71a510a621183a68dcb637ab02431542'} ```{.r .cell-code} # What is the percentage of customers using all three devices? percentage_all_three_devices ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] 0.5 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-8_eb7df2008d89c9be2ba3339713353d5f'} ```{.r .cell-code} # What is the percentage of customers using at least two devices? percentage_atleast_two_devices <- percentage_all_three_devices + percentage_smartphone_tablet + percentage_tablet_computer + percentage_smartphone_computer percentage_atleast_two_devices ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] 19.9 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-9_efc540e9f3849f0be81d4bdbfa797a94'} ```{.r .cell-code} #What is the percentage of customers using only one device? percentage_one_device <- percentage_smartphone + percentage_tablet + percentage_computer percentage_one_device ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] 80.1 ``` ::: ::: # Assignment 3 ------------------------------------------------------------------------ > Information from the Application ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-10_f0c97b8e30c97b3b8448e53ecb81baa8'} ```{.r .cell-code} P_B_given_A = 0.97 P_B_given_A_not = 0.01 P_A = 0.04 P_A_not <- 1 - P_A P_A_not ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] 0.96 ``` ::: ::: > We are required to find: - Probability that the product is faulty given that the alarm has gone off -- **P_A_given_B** - Probability that the product is not faulty given that the alarm has gone off -- **P_A_not_given_B** ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-11_21a4186aad17789f8bfd72e84a246b57'} ```{.r .cell-code} P_B = P_B_given_A * P_A + P_B_given_A_not * P_A_not P_B ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] 0.0484 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-12_5c3702706744bfbeb1e6ed4d410f0179'} ```{.r .cell-code} P_A_given_B = (P_B_given_A * P_A) / P_B P_A_given_B ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] 0.8016529 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-13_e4c2a6b75735190199af98536545c117'} ```{.r .cell-code} P_A_not_given_B = (P_B_given_A_not * P_A_not) / P_B P_A_not_given_B ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] 0.1983471 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-14_56c201938c45dd5aa1f3d3ddde9200d8'} ```{.r .cell-code} #These results show that in case the alarm is triggered, there is a possibility of about cat("# P_A_not_given_B =", P_A_not_given_B * 100, "% that the product is flawless and a") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> # P_A_not_given_B = 19.83471 % that the product is flawless and a ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} # probability of cat("# P_A_given_B =", P_A_given_B * 100, "% that the product is faulty") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> # P_A_given_B = 80.16529 % that the product is faulty ``` ::: ::: ::: callout-note You can delete everything in here and start fresh REALLY. ::: ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-15_4bb63e440c2bda808f92a38f743cb798'} ::: This is a `.qmd` file.
